name: UProceduralMeshComponent
doc:
Component that allows you to specify custom triangle mesh geometry
Beware! This feature is experimental and may be substantially changed in future releases.

bUseComplexAsSimpleCollision:
Controls whether the complex (Per poly) geometry should be treated as 'simple' collision.
Should be set to false if this component is going to be given simple collision and simulated.
bUseAsyncCooking: Controls whether the physics cooking should be done off the game thread. This should be used when collision geometry doesn't have to be immediately up to date (For example streaming in far away objects)

methods.name: AddCollisionConvexMesh
methods.doc: Add simple collision convex to this component

methods.name: ClearAllMeshSections
methods.doc: Clear all mesh sections and reset to empty state

methods.name: ClearCollisionConvexMeshes
methods.doc: Remove collision meshes from this component

methods.name: ClearMeshSection
methods.doc: Clear a section of the procedural mesh. Other sections do not change index.

methods.name: CreateMeshSection_LinearColor
GetNumSections
methods.doc: Returns number of sections currently created for this component

methods.name: IsMeshSectionVisible
methods.doc: Returns whether a particular section is currently visible

methods.name: SetMeshSectionVisible
methods.doc: Control visibility of a particular section

methods.name: UpdateMeshSection_LinearColor
